name: Tangles
storyline:
In the heart of an isolated island, a deserted camp sets the stage for a mysterious military operation. A squad of 8 soldiers arrive for this mission.
During the first days of training for the mission, Soldier Basel sustains a serious injury that leads him to a long coma. Upon awakening, he discovers a startling reality – all camp members have vanished, leaving behind a trail of enigmatic secrets.
Basel commences a journey filled with puzzles and challenges in an attempt to uncover the secrets surrounding the mysterious disappearance of his colleagues and discover the secrets of the mysterious mission.
summary: Awakening from a long coma following a training injury, Soldier Basel finds himself alone in an isolated camp on a deserted island surrounded by questions and mystery. Dive into a quest for answers, and the discovery of enigmatic secrets.
